port.description: RTCP port by default is rtp+1, it can also be set to rtcp-mux

capture_enabled.description: BETA - Enable the capture and storage of RTCP messages to create QoS reports on the Telnyx Mission Control Portal.

report_frequency_secs.description: RTCP reports are sent to customers based on the frequency set. Frequency is in seconds and it can be set to values from 5 to 3000 seconds.
